title: 2020 Votes Coverage, PA Rep. Brendan Boyle
itunes:title: 2020 Votes Coverage, PA Rep. Brendan Boyle
description:
Kevin was joined by Bloomberg's Carol Massar and June Grasso for special coverage of Election 2020. Guests: Roger Fisk, Democratic Strategist; long time President Obama aide and Principal of New Day Strategy, Matt Gorman, Vice President at Targeted Victory & Former NRCC Communications Director, and Rep. Brendan Boyle, a Democrat representing Pennsylvania's 2nd district.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
